item.title: Custom news scraper using free services from GitHub, Firebase, and Sengrid
item.description: Increasing large amount of technical news I read come from the posts shared on Hacker News or on Twitter. While both of these services have search options, neither of these seem to be advanced enough to narrow my searches at the desired level or to setup automatic delivery.
